description: Ministry of Labour & Trade Union Relation - Order to appoint Mr. K. A. T. Fernando as the arbitrator to the Industrial Dispute between Mr. G. W. Nimal Kumara and Eighteen Employees and Sri Lanka Mahaweli Authority - Order to appoint Mr. S. Virithamulla as the arbitrator to the Industrial  Dispute  between Mr. W. V. D. M. P. Welaramba and others and National Water Supply and Drainage Board
